title: Setting up the equation

title: Relating the Numbers
text: If two people take times t1 and t2 to accomplish a task, together it would take them time t; $$\frac{1}{t1}$$ + $$\frac{1}{t2}$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{1}{t}$$
